SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager

类 PauseMenuManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager.PauseMenuManager
public class PauseMenuManager extends Object
Manages the pause menu in the game, including pausing and resuming the game, and applying/removing the blur effect to elements when the game is paused.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private Control_PauseMenu
    controlPauseMenu
    The controller for the pause menu, responsible for handling UI interactions.
    private boolean
    isPaused
    Flag indicating whether the game is currently paused.
    private javafx.scene.Parent
    pauseMenuRoot
    The root node of the pause menu layout.
    private javafx.scene.Scene
    scene
    The current scene of the game.
    private javafx.animation.Timeline
    timeline
    The timeline controlling the game's animation.
    private UserInputManager
    userInputManager
    The user input manager to handle input when the game is paused or resumed.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    PauseMenuManager(javafx.animation.Timeline timeline, javafx.scene.Scene scene, UserInputManager userInputManager)
    Constructor to initialize the PauseMenuManager with the timeline, scene, and user input manager.

    修饰符和类型

    说明

    applyBlurToAllElementsExceptPauseMenu(javafx.scene.Node root, double radius)
    Apply Gaussian blur to all elements except the pause menu root.
    void
    continueGame()
    Resumes the game by playing the timeline, enabling user input, and removing the blur effect from all elements except the pause menu root.

    Returns the root node of the pause menu.

      private javafx.scene.Parent pauseMenuRoot
      The root node of the pause menu layout.

      The controller for the pause menu, responsible for handling UI interactions.

      Flag indicating whether the game is currently paused.

      The timeline controlling the game's animation.

      The current scene of the game.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • PauseMenuManager

      public PauseMenuManager(javafx.animation.Timeline timeline, javafx.scene.Scene scene, UserInputManager userInputManager)
      Constructor to initialize the PauseMenuManager with the timeline, scene, and user input manager.
      参数:
      timeline - the game timeline to pause/resume
      scene - the current scene
      userInputManager - the user input manager to disable/enable input during pause

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadPauseMenu

      public void loadPauseMenu()
      Loads the pause menu layout from FXML and initializes the control.

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the pause state of the game. If the game is paused, it will continue; otherwise, it will pause.

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game by stopping the timeline, disabling user input, and applying a blur effect to all elements except the pause menu root.

    • continueGame

      public void continueGame()
      Resumes the game by playing the timeline, enabling user input, and removing the blur effect from all elements except the pause menu root.

    • applyBlurToAllElementsExceptPauseMenu

      private void applyBlurToAllElementsExceptPauseMenu(javafx.scene.Node root, double radius)
      Apply Gaussian blur to all elements except the pause menu root.
      参数:
      root - The root node of the pause menu to exclude from blurring.
      radius - The radius of the blur effect.

    • removeBlurFromAllElementsExceptPauseMenu

      private void removeBlurFromAllElementsExceptPauseMenu(javafx.scene.Node root)
      Remove Gaussian blur from all elements except the pause menu root.
      参数:
      root - The root node of the pause menu to exclude from un-blurring.

    • setBlurEffect

      private void setBlurEffect(javafx.scene.Node node, double radius)
      Set Gaussian blur effect on a node.
      参数:
      node - The node to apply the effect on.
      radius - The radius of the blur effect.

    • removeBlurEffect

      private void removeBlurEffect(javafx.scene.Node node)
      Remove the Gaussian blur effect from a node.
      参数:
      node - The node to remove the effect from.

    • getPauseMenuRoot

      public javafx.scene.Parent getPauseMenuRoot()
      Returns the root node of the pause menu.
      返回:
      the pause menu root node
